segments.text: Do you want any meat today , Mrs Bird ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you want beef or lamb ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like lamb , but my husband doesn't .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about some steak ? This is a nice piece .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Give me that piece please , and a pond of meet , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want a chicken , Mrs Bird ? They're very nice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thank you.My husband likes steak , but he doesn't like chicken .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To tell you the truth Mrs . Bird , I don't like chicken , either !
segments.speaker: S1
